member.summary: The amount to physically move the notch each time a directional button is pressed Derived by taking number of steps needed to move through values (upperBound / increment amount) Then by divinging the default length of the bar by that.

member.summary: Used for physically keeping the notch on the sliderbar

member.summary: Labels for displaying information needed.

member.name: F:GameEngine.GUI.Sliderbar.lastMovement
member.summary: Used for time delay when moving Notch

member.summary: Amount to offset valueLabel so text is centered to middle of bar

member.summary: creates the labels displaying slider bar information

member.summary: Binds controls for sliderbar.

member.name: M:GameEngine.GUI.Sliderbar.MoveLeft
member.summary: Moves slider, and value left. (decrements)

member.name: M:GameEngine.GUI.Sliderbar.MoveRight
member.summary: Moves slider, and value right. (increments)

member.name: M:GameEngine.GUI.Sliderbar.MoveByAmount(System.Single)
member.summary: Increments value by amount give, also increments slider, and keeps value in bounds. pass negative for left, and positive for right.

member.name: M:GameEngine.GUI.Sliderbar.KeepValueInBounds
member.summary: Prevents user from selecting values outside of bounds.

member.name: M:GameEngine.GUI.Sliderbar.MoveSlider(GameEngine.GUI.Sliderbar.Direction)
member.summary: Will move the visable slider in a direction pass negative to move left, and positive to move right.

member.summary: Slider bar does not really have a use function.. leave blank for now.
